activities.title: Areas of Activity
activities.subtitle: Key areas where the Dordoi Association implements projects and contributes to the development of Kyrgyzstan

items.title: Trade and Logistics
items.description: The largest trade and logistics complex in Central Asia - an engine of the national economy and a symbol of Kyrgyz entrepreneurship.

items.title: Finance and Manufacturing
items.description: The economic backbone of the Association: microfinance, insurance, and investment companies creating jobs.

items.title: Education and Science
items.description: Investing in the future: supporting schools, universities, and educational centers, scholarship and grant programs.

items.title: Medicine and Healthcare
items.description: Caring for the nation's health: modern clinics, medical centers, and social projects to support the population.

items.title: Sports
items.description: A symbol of strength and national pride: the Dordoi football club, support for national sports and youth.

items.title: Culture and Tourism
items.description: Spiritual and cultural revival: supporting the film industry, theaters, cultural centers, and festivals.

items.title: Social Responsibility
items.description: Caring for people: building mosques, schools, sports complexes, helping those in need, and spiritual development.

news.title: News and Important Events
news.subtitle: Current achievements, initiatives, and projects of the Dordoi Association

items.title: FC Dordoi becomes champion of Kyrgyzstan 2025
items.description: The team won the national title for the 11th time, confirming its status as the country's strongest club in an exciting final match.

items.title: The Association opened a new educational center in Osh region
items.description: The modern center is equipped with advanced equipment and will serve as a platform for developing talented youth in the region.

items.title: Dordoi and business partners from Turkey signed a memorandum of cooperation
items.description: The document will strengthen economic ties between the countries and create new opportunities for mutual investment and development.

items.title: Charity event in Batken: assistance to more than 500 families
items.description: The Association provided humanitarian support and essential goods to the affected regions.

items.title: Anniversary celebrations: 30 years of the Dordoi Association
items.description: Large-scale events dedicated to the organization's thirtieth anniversary brought together thousands of partners and friends.

items.title: Premiere of a national film in the Cinematika cinema network
items.description: The screening of the new Kyrgyz film attracted a record number of viewers and received rave reviews from critics.

history.title: Development
history.subtitle: Key milestones of our journey from foundation to the present day

milestones.title: Foundation of the Market
milestones.description: In December 1991, the legendary Dordoi market was founded, marking the beginning of a new era of entrepreneurship in Kyrgyzstan. This became the starting point for the development of private business in the country.

milestones.title: Formation of the Entrepreneurial Class
milestones.description: In the 1990s, Dordoi became a real 'business school' for thousands of Kyrgyzstanis. The first entrepreneurs were formed here, the basics of a market economy were mastered, and business traditions were laid.

milestones.title: Revival of Cinemas
milestones.description: The launch of the Cinematika network marked a new era in the country's cultural life. Modern cinemas were opened: 'Oktyabr', 'Ala-Too', 'Vefa', 'Cosmopark', 'Bishkek Park', 'Dordoi Plaza', and others.

milestones.title: World Bank Statistics
milestones.description: According to World Bank data, about 50,000 people were directly employed at Dordoi. This confirmed the significant contribution to the economy and employment.

milestones.title: Investment in Development
milestones.description: From 2010 to 2020, large-scale investments were made in various spheres: sports, education, medicine. This contributed to the socio-economic development of the regions.

milestones.title: Fight against COVID-19
milestones.description: During the difficult period of the pandemic, a significant contribution was made to the fight against coronavirus: 1 million soms in funds and 7.5 million soms in food and protective equipment.

milestones.title: Assistance to Batken
milestones.description: Large-scale assistance was provided to the Batken region: 20 tons of humanitarian aid were delivered and a kindergarten for 100 children was built.

milestones.title: Publication of the book 'Dordoi - 30 Years'
milestones.description: In honor of the 30th anniversary, the book 'Dordoi - 30 Years' was published, becoming a valuable archival material and chronicle of achievements. The book contains unique photographs and memories.

structure.title: Our Structure
structure.subtitle: A comprehensive organization uniting key areas for maximum efficiency

trade.name: Trade
trade.detailed: Our trade division specializes in the international distribution of premium quality goods. We have built a strong supply chain network ensuring efficient delivery and optimal conditions for our partners.

logistics.name: Logistics
logistics.detailed: The logistics division provides a full range of supply chain management services, including multimodal transport, warehouse logistics, and customs clearance.

finance.name: Finance
finance.detailed: The finance division deals with asset management, investment projects, and providing comprehensive financial solutions for businesses and private clients.

education.name: Education
education.detailed: The education division develops and implements innovative training programs, professional development courses, and retraining programs.

medicine.name: Medicine
medicine.detailed: The medical division combines modern clinics, research centers, and innovative projects in healthcare and medical technology.

sport.name: Sports
sport.detailed: The sports division organizes large-scale events, develops sports infrastructure, and supports professional athletes.

culture.name: Culture
culture.detailed: The culture division implements projects in art, cultural heritage preservation, and supports creative initiatives.

persons.name: Askar Salymbekov
persons.bio: Visionary leader with over 20 years of experience in business development and strategic planning. Founded numerous successful enterprises in various industries.
persons.fullBio: Askar Salymbekov is a recognized leader in the business community with over 20 years of management experience. Under his leadership, the company has achieved significant growth and international recognition. He is the author of several innovative business models that have become industry standards in Central Asia.
persons.education: MBA Harvard Business School, Master of Economics KNU
achievements: Founded and scaled over 10 successful companies
Pioneer of innovative business models in Central Asia
Mentor to over 100 young entrepreneurs and business leaders
Awarded the national 'Business Leader of the Year' prize
Attracted over $100 million in investments to the region

persons.name: Samarbek Zhaparakunov
persons.bio: Experienced executive with expertise in operational excellence and digital transformation. Passionate about building high-performing teams and sustainable business practices.
persons.fullBio: Samarbek Zhaparakunov possesses deep knowledge in operational management and digital transformation. Under his leadership, the company underwent complete digitalization of business processes, leading to significant efficiency improvements and cost reductions.
persons.education: Master of Business Management, London Business School
achievements: Executed digital transformation of all business units
Implemented ESG initiatives across the organization

persons.name: Ainura Askarova
persons.bio: Financial strategist with 15+ years of experience in corporate finance and investment management. Specializes in financial planning and risk management strategies.
persons.fullBio: Ainura Askarova is a certified financial analyst with international experience at leading financial institutions. Her strategic vision and deep understanding of capital markets helped the company attract significant investments and optimize its financial structure.
persons.education: CFA, Master of Finance New York University

persons.name: Bakit Zhamankulov
persons.bio: Technology innovator with experience in software development and digital infrastructure. Focused on leveraging cutting-edge technologies for business growth.
persons.fullBio: Bakit Zhamankulov is an expert in technology and digital infrastructure. Under his technical leadership, the company developed proprietary technology platforms that became a competitive advantage in the market. He actively implements advanced technologies, including AI and machine learning.
achievements: Led development of proprietary technology platforms
Reduced infrastructure costs by 30% through optimization
Built and scaled engineering team from 10 to 50+ specialists

missionAbout.footerText: Join our mission and become part of the changes

values.title: Hard Work
values.description: Value hard work and persistence as foundation of any achievement and success
values.detailed: We believe that constant improvement and diligence are the engine of progress. Every team member contributes to the common cause, and we are proud of our work ethic.

values.title: Unity
values.description: Work as one team, supporting each other and achieving common goals together
values.detailed: Team cohesion is our key asset. We create environment where everyone feels supported and can maximize their potential.

values.title: Creation
values.description: Create projects that change people's lives for better and develop country's economy
values.detailed: Our work aims to create long-term value. We build not just projects, but foundation for society's future development.

values.title: Responsibility
values.description: Acknowledge our responsibility to society, partners and future generations
values.detailed: We take responsibility for every decision made and its consequences. Our reputation is built on reliability and transparency.

values.title: Community Support
values.description: Actively participate in social projects and support local communities
values.detailed: We invest in local community development, support educational initiatives and contribute to job creation.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Constantly seek new approaches and technologies to improve our activities
values.detailed: Innovation is not just a word for us, but a mindset. We constantly research new technologies and methods to improve our processes.

press.title: News and
press.subtitle: Current news, events and official company announcements

news.title: New Sustainable Development Project
news.lead: Launch of eco-friendly production using solar energy
news.fullText:
The company announces the launch of a new environmental project aimed at reducing carbon footprint and implementing sustainable practices in the production process.

The project includes installation of 5 MW solar panels, water recycling system and transition to biodegradable materials. This is expected to reduce CO2 emissions by 40% within the next year.

news.title: Technological Partnership with University
news.lead: Signing agreement for joint research in artificial intelligence
news.fullText:
The company has concluded a strategic partnership with a leading technical university for joint work on projects in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

Within the framework of cooperation, a research center will be established where students and company employees will work on innovative projects. The first joint project will be development of a demand forecasting system using neural networks.

news.title: New Trade Complex Opening
news.lead: Grand opening of modern trade complex with participation of city administration representatives
news.fullText:
December 15, 2023 marked a significant event for our city - the opening of a new 10,000 m² trade complex. The opening ceremony was attended by the city mayor, business community representatives and local residents.

The complex includes 150 trading spaces, modern parking for 300 cars and visitor recreation areas. The project was implemented considering the latest retail trends and will create over 500 new jobs.

news.title: Charity Marathon for Children
news.lead: Company organized annual charity marathon in support of orphanages
news.fullText:
On December 10, 2023, the annual charity marathon organized with support from our company took place. The event gathered over 1000 participants and helped raise funds for orphanage children.

All collected funds will be directed towards facility repairs, purchase of educational materials and organization of developmental activities for children.

news.title: Logistics Center Launch
news.lead: Modern logistics center with automated management system commissioned
news.fullText:
On December 5, 2023, a new logistics center equipped with modern equipment and automated warehouse management system was launched.

The 15,000 m² center will optimize inventory turnover and reduce delivery times for our partners. Implementation of modern technologies will increase efficiency of logistics operations by 40%.

news.title: Cooperation Memorandum Signing
news.lead: Strategic partnership concluded with leading national university
news.fullText:
On December 1, 2023, a cooperation memorandum was signed between our company and the National University. The document provides for joint work in personnel training, scientific research and implementation of educational programs.

Within the cooperation framework, internship programs for students, joint research and professional courses are planned.

news.title: Corporate Policy Update
news.fullText:
On November 25, 2023, the updated company environmental policy was approved, aimed at reducing carbon footprint and implementing sustainable business practices.

Main policy directions include transition to renewable energy sources, implementation of waste recycling system and resource consumption reduction. The company plans to achieve carbon neutrality by 2030.

news.title: Corporate Employee Celebration
news.lead: Annual corporate celebration dedicated to company anniversary held
news.fullText:
On November 20, 2023, the annual corporate celebration dedicated to the company's 32nd anniversary took place. The event gathered over 2000 employees and their families.

The celebration program included concerts, sports competitions, contests and awards for best employees. Special attention was given to company veterans who made significant contributions to organization development.

They specialize in creating scalable, secure, and innovative technology solutions that drive business growth and operational efficiency across various industries including finance, healthcare, and manufacturing.

Their team of scientists and engineers works on cutting-edge projects that redefine industry standards in AI, robotics, and sustainable technologies.

globalsolutions.description: Powerful consulting company helping businesses navigate complex global markets and digital transformation.
globalsolutions.achievement2: Successful global expansion projects in 25+ countries

With offices in 12 countries, they offer localized expertise with global perspective, helping clients navigate cultural, regulatory, and market challenges.

futuretech.achievement1: AI Innovation Award 2023 for industrial automation

Their solutions help businesses achieve unprecedented levels of efficiency and innovation through smart technology integration, IoT implementation, and predictive maintenance systems.

partnersProjects.title: Partnerships and Projects
partnersProjects.subtitle: Strategic cooperation with international partners for sustainable development and economic growth

projects.title: Joint Industrial Zone with Turkey
projects.description: Creation of modern industrial zone for production potential development and export capacity
projects.fullDescription: Large-scale project to create a modern industrial zone including production facilities, logistics centers and research laboratories. The project aims to develop export potential and create high-tech jobs. Partnership with leading Turkish companies allows implementation of advanced technologies and international management standards.
projects.impact: Creation of 500+ jobs, export potential development

projects.title: Textile Industry Investments with China
projects.description: Modern textile factories with full production cycle and export orientation
projects.fullDescription: Joint investment project to create modern textile enterprises with full production cycle. Implementation of advanced technologies and international quality standards. The project includes construction of spinning, weaving and sewing factories, as well as a training center.
projects.impact: 40% export growth, creation of sustainable textile industry

projects.title: Vocational Education Program with GIZ
projects.description: Development of vocational education system and training qualified personnel for industry
projects.fullDescription: Comprehensive program for modernization of vocational education system in cooperation with German Society for International Cooperation (GIZ). Includes updating curricula, equipping workshops with modern equipment and teacher training.
projects.impact: Improving vocational education quality, reducing youth unemployment

projects.title: Educational Exchanges with KOICA
projects.description: Academic mobility program and experience exchange between Kyrgyzstan and South Korea
projects.fullDescription: Large-scale educational exchange and academic mobility program implemented with support of Korea International Cooperation Agency (KOICA). The program covers students, graduate students and teachers, facilitating knowledge and technology transfer.
projects.impact: Strengthening academic ties, improving higher education quality

projects.title: SME Development with USAID
projects.description: Comprehensive support for small and medium businesses through access to financing and consultations
projects.fullDescription: Small and medium business support program implemented with technical assistance from USAID. Includes providing microloans, business consultations, trainings and mentor support. Special attention to women entrepreneurs and startups.
projects.impact: Economic diversification, entrepreneurship support, job creation

projects.title: Turkish-Kyrgyz Educational Center
projects.description: Modern educational center for training specialists in IT and engineering
projects.fullDescription: Joint project to create multifunctional educational center specializing in IT specialists and engineers training. The center is equipped with modern computer classes, laboratories and coworking zones for project work.
projects.impact: IT ecosystem development, training highly qualified personnel for digital economy

projects.title: Solar Power Plant Construction with EBRD
projects.description: Largest solar power plant in Central Asia with 100 MW capacity
projects.fullDescription: Ambitious project to build solar power plant in partnership with European Bank for Reconstruction and Development. The station uses advanced technologies and contributes to diversification of country's energy sector.
projects.impact: Sustainable energy supply, reducing dependence on imported electricity

projects.title: Irrigation Systems Modernization with ADB
projects.description: Comprehensive modernization of water supply and irrigation systems in rural regions
projects.fullDescription: Asian Development Bank project for irrigation infrastructure modernization, including construction of new canals, installation of modern irrigation systems and training farmers in water-saving technologies.
projects.impact: Improving water use efficiency, sustainable agricultural development

upcoming.title: International Economic Forum 2024
upcoming.theme: Digital Transformation and Sustainable Economic Development
upcoming.description: The largest international conference bringing together business leaders, government officials and experts to discuss the future of Central Asian economy
upcoming.fullDescription: International Economic Forum 2024 will gather leading experts, policymakers and business leaders to discuss key trends in digital transformation and sustainable development. The program includes: panel discussions, workshops and B2B meetings with international partners.
speakers: Ahmet Yılmaz - President of Turkish Business Association

upcoming.title: Regional Business Dialogue "Silk Road"
upcoming.theme: Development of trade and economic cooperation in the region
upcoming.description: Dialogue platform for business community of Central Asian countries on trade development and investment cooperation
upcoming.fullDescription: Silk Road Business Dialogue aims to strengthen economic ties between Central Asian countries. The event includes sessions on trade, investments and logistics, as well as practical workshops.
speakers: Li Chen - Director of Chinese Chamber of Commerce

upcoming.title: Business Conference "Investments in Industry"
upcoming.theme: Attracting investments to Kyrgyzstan's industrial sector
upcoming.description: Specialized conference dedicated to presentation of investment projects and establishing partnership links between investors and industrial enterprises
upcoming.fullDescription: Investments in Industry conference provides unique opportunity for industrial enterprises to present their projects to potential investors. The program includes: pitch sessions, individual consultations and meetings with international investment funds.

archive.title: International Conference on Sustainable Development 2023
archive.theme: Green economy and environmental initiatives in business
archive.description: Conference dedicated to implementation of sustainable development principles in business processes and environmental innovations
archive.fullDescription: The conference gathered sustainable development experts to discuss green technologies, environmental standards and corporate social responsibility. Participants received practical tools for implementing ESG principles.
outcomes: 5 pilot projects on green technologies launched
testimonials: Excellent organization and high level of speakers. Lots of useful information for our business.
The conference helped us find partners for implementing solar panels at our production.

archive.title: Regional Small and Medium Business Forum
archive.theme: Support and development of SMEs in Kyrgyzstan's regions
archive.description: Forum aimed at discussing problems and prospects of small and medium business development in the country's regions
archive.fullDescription: SME Forum became a platform for dialogue between entrepreneurs, government agencies and international donors. Main topics: access to financing, marketing and export opportunities.
testimonials: Very useful event for regional business. Learned about new support programs.
Found suppliers from neighboring regions. Great opportunities for cooperation.

archive.title: Business Conference "Export Opportunities"
archive.location: Bishkek, Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Kyrgyzstan
archive.theme: Expanding export potential of Kyrgyz enterprises
archive.description: Specialized conference on issues of Kyrgyz companies entering international markets and developing export activities
archive.fullDescription: Export Opportunities conference provided Kyrgyz companies with information about international market requirements, certification procedures and logistics solutions. Special attention was paid to EAEU and Chinese markets.
speakers: Gulnara Abdraimova - Chamber of Commerce and Industry
testimonials: The conference opened new horizons for our business. Already negotiating with partners from Kazakhstan.
Professional consultations on product certification. Very useful for exporters.
